summary: The quarterly project review covered progress across multiple workstreams including backend infrastructure, UX redesign, and customer onboarding optimization. The team evaluated performance metrics from the previous sprint, highlighting areas where latency has improved by 15% and user onboarding completion has increased by 10%. Discussion focused on refining backend caching logic, expanding A/B tests for the signup flow, and establishing clearer ownership over cross-functional dependencies. There was also an extended review of customer feedback data collected from the beta release, emphasizing the need for clearer in-app guidance and better error handling in the account setup sequence.
decisions: Implement caching improvements for user data retrieval by end of month.
Roll out second phase of onboarding A/B test starting next sprint.
Reassign ownership of customer onboarding flow to the Growth team.

action_items.task: Profile and optimize caching layer for user endpoints
Design updated onboarding variation for A/B testing
Prepare customer feedback summary for leadership review
Implement error handling improvements in setup process
Plan cross-team sync on Growth ownership transfer
